title: I'm trying to figure out what song to use for a WW vid.
body:
I'm using PowerWolf metal band as the music of choice.
and these are the music contenders.

Blessed and Possessed:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9Q5Qowx99Zs

--

Army Of The Night: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SlwHEeGcOOc

--

We Are The Wild: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mPRHA0CJoFA

--

Christ And Combat: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D3j5sRir5X8

--

All You Can Bleed:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XxLWIV2Jlzs

Making a few videos-
an "AMV" like one for WW.
and a few videos where I played old WW and the New one.

replies.body:
We are the wild sounds the best thematically for me, good buildup to the chorus, then goes epic. All you can bleed was actually around the same preference though, I'd use both in separate ones.

Also I've never heard of these guys but I'm picturing a biker furry now.
No idea if they are furries, but they sound so fucking cool.

None of them.

Disturbed - The animal
That will be a disco heat video soon.
